title: Bonus Episode - Profiling Dirty John
description:
The RCP team (Jim Clemente, Laura Richards and Lisa Zambetti) welcome Christopher Goffard, the Los Angeles Times writer, to the show to discuss his new hit podcast Dirty John. This episode covers the first three episodes of the program which is a six part podcast. Debra Newell and her on line love John Meehan are introduced. John was the beau who was too good to be true and it turns out he wasn't.

New to Real Crime Profile? Never miss an episode by subscribing today at smarturl.it/realcrime.

Listen to the rest of Dirty John and subscribe here so you never miss an episode: https://smarturl.it/dirtyjohn


See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
